name: places/ChIJVeM0HbtZwokRRgukBGHyotY
formattedAddress: 51 W 14th St # 2r, New York, NY 10011, USA
adrFormatAddress: 51 W 14th St # 2r, New York, NY 10011-0110, USA

originalText.text:
This is the second time I've had a tattoo done at Rising Dragon (the first was well over a decade ago), and this new experience was (as the first one was) absolutely first-rate. My tattooist, Darren, and I went back and forth about the design, and he truly listened to my ideas, presented ideas of his own, and what we ended up with was not really like what I'd initially had in mind—but, truly, so much better. (I think that listening to the artist/expert is always a good idea.)

The tattoo was done in two sessions and couldn't have been a more genial experience. And I couldn't be happier with the result.

text.text:

originalText.text: I have been to rising dragon tattoo for years. They have done most of my tatts. All the large work. They are professional and relaxed and fair. Darren has been my artist twice now and I am in love with the experience he offers as well as his work. He listens to what I want and is a perfect sounding board for ideas and suggestions. He's got an amazing sense of space and balance and his artistic aesthetic is superb. Highly suggest this place to anyone who wants tattoo art and wants work that is quality and extraordinary.

text.text: I have been to rising dragon tattoo for years. They have done most of my tatts. All the large work. They are professional and relaxed and fair. Darren has been my artist twice now and I am in love with the experience he offers as well as his work. He listens to what I want and is a perfect sounding board for ideas and suggestions. He's got an amazing sense of space and balance and his artistic aesthetic is superb. Highly suggest this place to anyone who wants tattoo art and wants work that is quality and extraordinary.

originalText.text: I decided on Rising Dragon Tattoos for my first tattoo after reviewing Darren’s beautiful work online.  From the moment of first contacting him and through to the end of the process Darren was responsive and sensitive to my needs and concerns, as well as being thoroughly professional, pleasant, comfortable and confidence inspiring.  I couldn’t be more pleased with the large, pectoral tattoo that Darren executed for me.  If I decide to add further tattoos, there is no question that I would return to Rising Dragon and ask Darren handle them for me. The studio itself is very attractive with a great deal of beautiful and inspirational artwork displayed.  A very comfortable and friendly place. Thanks, Darren!

originalText.text: Awesome experience! I came as a walk-in and thankfully was able to get right in. My artist took the time and care to get my idea just right and was happy to keep iterating until I was happy. The tattooing itself was so quick and easy and I am thrilled with my new tattoo! Yay. Couldn’t have asked for better. Will absolutely come again for my next fix of existential vibes (see image).

originalText.text: I got my first ever tattoo done here by Darren the dude! He was super amazing and helped me feel confident throughout the entire process. The shop overall has a great atmosphere. Will definitely be coming back for more in the future!!
